title: Thermodynamics
description: Introduction to the basic concepts of thermodynamics. Thermodynamic laws will be developed with an emphasis on the macroscopic point of view.  Applications of the basic principles will be considered briefly.
restrictions: __HEADER_0__Must be enrolled in one of the following Campuses:
prerequisites: (PHYS 2212 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or PHYS 2232 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D) and (MATH 2403 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or MATH 2413 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or MATH 24X3 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of T or MATH 2552 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or MATH 2562 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or MATH 2X52 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of T)
